scenario.name: uac
scenario.send: OPTIONS sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch][pid] Max-Forwards: 70 From: sipp <sip:[field0]@[field1]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[field0]@[field1]> Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 OPTIONS User-Agent: pbx125 Date: Mon, 04 Aug 2014 11:09:50 GMT Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, OPTIONS, BYE, REFER, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, INFO, PUBLISH Supported: replaces, timer Content-Length: 0
